column3: “Here we go.  So this Pennywise was a 1:1 ratio of THC and CBD (9% of each to be exact) so then.  Very cautious about taking anything with THC in it, or high amounts for sure, so Pennywise seemed like a good alternative to some others out there.  It was a very mellow feeling....no racing heart just calm.  No heavy headed feeling either.  What a bonus there.  Definitely will use again.”

“This is easily the best strain I've ever smoked, medicinally or recreationally, and I've smoked for 10 years. In terms of my conditions, I find this strain eliminates my chronic nerve pain, especially the breakthrough pain, and does absolute wonders on my anxiety. The 1:1 THC:CBD content really makes it the most effective for both of my conditions. It improves my mood dramatically and leaves me with a lot more cognit...”

“My favorite strain so far. I suffer from depression and an anxiety disorder, and this strain treats both. Made me feel very relaxed with just a little head buzz. High in CBD is the way to go for me. Definitely recommend for anxiety and depression.”

“Pennywise is the strain that changed my life. It's the first cannabis I've used in four years. I stopped because I had started having anxiety attacks every time I was high. It didn't take many times for that to scare me off.

I have anxiety and depression, and it's such a relief to have found Pennywise. I felt nothing but positive impact on my chemicals after sipping vapor for a steady two hours. I paced myself and f...”

“My favorite strain so far. I suffer from depression and anxiety, which quadruples with PMDD (a severe form of PMS) every month. This strain helps with all three. Felt very relaxed with very little head buzz. I highly recommend this strain for those who prefer the medical benefits this strain provides and still have a clear head.”

“Pennywise has been my go-to strain for Cluster Headache pain management. I have debilitating headaches that come on within minutes, or wake me from a deep sleep, and reach a pain level of around 8 to 10 very rapidly. The extreme pain can make me very nauseous, restless, and anxious if left untreated.

At the first sign of a headache, I vaporize about 200mg of finely ground bud, and within seconds I am feeling real pa...”

“KILLS PAIN. I got some Pennywise BHO on 4/20/15 and it showed me nature put a safe painkiller in a flower — and it's called Cannabis, not Opium Poppy!  I'd just been diagnosed with shoulder tendinitis, and that's on top of widespread pain from fibromyalgia and TMJ issues with muscular pain in face/jaw/neck and occasional tension headaches. This is the first high-CBD strain I've tried and I was floored!  Pennywise lit...”

“My partner and I were very fortunate and got a hold of seeds that were the high CBD pheno!! We grew two of these ladies to finish and can not give it enough praise!! Easy to grow, mold and pest resistant, and very potent pain and anxiety killing effects. We are going to be growing her again and will be for some time!! Don't let the high CBD fool you either.. our girl also has the added effect of being pretty high THC...”

“This is a very important medicinal strain.  The calming and anti-inflammatory effects from the CBD are very strong, and while the THC is still present in an even ratio, it's effects are very clearly being modulated towards the more healing" side than the "high" side.  The aroma is skunky
column4: with a hint of woodiness.  The flavour of the vapour was earthy and spicey
column5: reminiscent of its Jack Herer parentage.  It's name i...”"

column3:
“I discovered PennyWise at the Downtown Dispensary in Tucson.  What a find! 

I deal with degenerative joint disease, degenerative disc disease, and PTSD.  Pharmaceutical medicines often don't agree with me (and usually don't work, and have awful side effects).  When I whiffed this excellent medicine, the aroma reached out and sucked me right into the jar.  I bought an ounce.

In six weeks, I've gone from taking three...”

“Here is another good one! 1:1 strain which helps with pain and nerves. This is also a night strain, you'll want to hit the bed within an hour or two. If you are looking for a night time strain which is high in CBD, this is a good one! Oh, and NO anxiety or parinoid feeling at all. It reminds me of a Mars OG with a hint of GDP.”

“An amazing strain but take it easy as a little pinch goes a long ways. It hits quick, not a creeper.  An awesome  male and female aphrodisiac. Immediate erection and multi enhanced orgasm for both me and the wife. Happy uplifted feeling, but not for daytime use.  Sit back and relax...because you're not wanting to go far away from your lady...the fridge and the bed.”

“My dispensary had lab tests for this that made it appear to be 1:1 cbd-thc ratio. Those are the kind of tinctures I buy so I figured I'd give Pennywise a try. BEST STRAIN I've used for rheumatoid arthritis.  It provides rapid relief and unlocks any stuck joints within 15 minutes. It also provides a nice indica body high/moderate stone that is a little lighter than most indica's I've used because of the CBD's relaxati...”
“I was having a panic attack, and took a few hits of this, it immediately helped to focus and calm me. Great for Anxiety. Relaxing and a good mixed body and head high for me.”

“Pennywise is one of my favourite daytime strains. A nice mild buzz that leaves you uplifted and clear minded. I suffer from chronic back pain and PTSD. Aphria's Pennywise helps me escape from both conditions.”

“often anxiety is a big issue for me especially rite know it's thru the roof  I am about to roll up a jay and let the Pennywise take me back down to the Lobby .  it's taste really good in a herbalizer So black peppery with fishy after taste CBD goodness. and it works wonders for all the pain attributed to a spinal cord injury from a Gunshot.GW”

“Welcome to pennywise, a smokers smoke. Best described as An Iron-fist with a satin glove. Thick and robust on the inhale, soft and smooth on the exhale, pennywise is a powerful strain with a strong nose that induces a numbing effect very different from other indicas. Perfect for relaxing and letting go,  pennywise has you from the first toke. Where this strain makes its mark is on the surprising power with the obviou...”

“often anxiety is a big issue for me especially rite know it's thru the roof  I am about to roll up a jay and let the Pennywise take me back down to the Lobby .  it's taste really good in a herbalizer So black peppery with fishy after taste CBD goodness. and it works wonders for all the pain attributed to a spinal cord injury from a Gunshot.GW”

“This was the first bud I've smoked in over eight years. I felt a little socially awkward at first but no anxiety. Very clear thoughts, helped me see through my own BS, answers became simple. Felt active, motivated, and aware.”

“This strain definitely helped neutralize my mood & nervousness after an anxiety attack. it was recommended to me for treating PTSD/Manic Depression. The effects kicked in instantaneously without leaving an exhausted feeling. although, it's relaxing enough to help you sleep. it sort of made lights and colors seem more vibrant.”
“Great morning to mid-day bud. It's surprising that with equal portions of CBD and THC (8-9%) this bud get me feeling high and yet put together" as well. Head and body buzz are both there
column4: but not super strong. Sale rep recommend it as a low cost product
column6: and calm; she was right now.”"

column3: “This is the viagra of cannibis. AWSOME!   A pill should be made from this.  A green pill???? Would surely give the blue pill competition.  A very nice overall strain.”
“Oh wow
column4: am I high? ..yeah.. I'm definitely high.. but there's something else there that makes me feel dizzy yet functional."

column2: 10 minutes after vaporizing that earthy herbal goodness known as Pennywise.
with a mental buzz and a dizzying sort of clarity
column3: if that makes any sense. Smoking too much though can  cause headaches and provoke a bit of physical anxiety

“this could be the only strain that really helps me

I take it for sleep and anxiety

it's similar to Xanax, yet the benzo family of drugs is hell to get off of

I wish I could find this one easier in my area :(”

“Interesting strain. A bit of a creeper, this one tasted peppery, and I'm very relaxed. The smoke is mild, not too harsh and the buzz is rather even and smooth, even though it crept up, the on set was slower than most creeper strains. Just a small hit or two will do ya for penny wise, keep that in mind!”

“In my search for a low paranoia strain that could still lend some euphoria, I'm pleased with Pennywise. I felt happy, a little silly, carefree, and no anxiety or paranoia or spiraling thoughts.

In my limited experience I found the strength to be pretty moderate. I wasn't in danger of one or two pulls too many putting me way too far over. The more intense part of the peak was also moderate in duration, but the relaxe...”
“so far good for muscle spasm and neuro pain. good clear head”
“I have severe anxiety and panic attacks. Pennywise calms and relaxes my mind. I wake up in a great mood. My favorite strain.”

“Mild smell and flavour. Flavour was a little bit like the light green pressed Moroccan hash we used to get in the 70s, almost like faint perfume. Vapor went down easy at first, but started to get pretty harsh half-way through.  
Effects- Quickly relaxing, not bad for joint pain and excellent for inflammation and muscle tightness. I was thinking straight. I was focused on one thing for periods, almost in the groove ra...”

“Pennywise has been my favorite strain I've tried so far. I have bad anxiety and nausea associated with it. This helps me in both of those factors. I also have a hard time sleeping and the negative" dry eyes help me get to sleep. The first few times I vaped it I got pretty high. Now I have gotten used to it more and it's never overwhelming. I vape this almost every night before bed.

column1: Head High: Low -- I feel dumb mos...”"

column3: “This is my favorite strain. It is high in CBD so my head is still clear but i feel ultra relaxed and happy. Although Indica, i prefer not to smoke it before bed because I need something that calms my brain a little bit more to sleep, so I enjoy this at the beginning of my day.”

“Pennywise is THE ideal strain for managing day time pain. It's CBD to THC ratio is more balanced that other strains with a slightly higher CBD%. By itself, PW will gently ease low to moderate pain levels of 1 to maybe 5, if you're familiar with the happy/sad pain chart. Combine a high CBD editable, like the gold foiled taffy with upwards of 80mg CBD, to help severe or chronic pain levels of 6 or higher . If your goal...”

“This is my favorite strain. It is high in CBD so my head is still clear but i feel ultra relaxed and happy. Although Indica, i prefer not to smoke it before bed because I need something that calms my brain a little bit more to sleep, so I enjoy this at the beginning of my day.”

“I am new to cannabis. That being said this is my favorite strain. It can be hard to find however. 
          With the CBD and low THC content it strikes a good balance of curbing anxiety and restlessness and making me feel .... well ... just damn good ! What I love is how clear headed I can be. Second only to something like  Canna Tsu " for how clear my head is. This does put that gentle fog over your head...”"

“Pennywise is awesome at reliving pain and inflammation. With two hits from my pen and 10 minutes, i start feeling the relief. It can cause a little headache but only if you do too much at one time. 
The taste is a little like what I think liquid soap would taste like. A little harsh on the back of the throat if the hit is too big.  Pennywise is my first high cbd indica and I really like it for the pain relief. I don'...”

“Perhaps Illinois strand is stronger than most because my bottle comes in at 17% THC. These nugs are thick and heavy, Breaking down almost into a powder. Perfect for joint rolling. The Effects I have experienced are that of a very mild Indica. It's definitely not a strand that you want to use if you have an active day ahead of you. However I'm not so couch lock that I can't get up. Perfect for chilling" all day

“I have to say, I was completely blown away by Pennywise. It's a 1:1 cbd/thc coming in at around 7%, so I honestly wasn't expecting very much. I purchased it as a bit of an afterthought, wanting to sample a strain with high cbd content. Looks and smells great, and is really pleasant to smoke. The effects are really remarkable. It is energetic and uplifting in the manner of a lot of sativas, but whether it's due to the...”

“I struggle with anxiety and panic attacks so I have to be super careful with THC cuz it usually it just makes me go mental. Pennywise makes me feel relaxed without racing thoughts, and a heavy head. I can still process thoughts and focus. Very good strain.”

“High strain of CBD/THC grade of bud that is excellent for relaxation, upset stomachs, headaches, monthly symptoms due to periods, etc. I usually blend it with a higher THC strain to give a mellow effect in the evenings or when I need to chill out. I always try to keep a reverse of this blend because, it sells out fast at Canntrust.”
“I suffer from high anxiety and this strain is great for getting me through the day! I feel motivated and clear headed.”

“I am new to cannabis. That being said this is my favorite strain. It can be hard to find however. 
          With the CBD and low THC content it strikes a good balance of curbing anxiety and restlessness and making me feel .... well ... just damn good ! What I love is how clear headed I can be. Second only to something like  Canna Tsu " for how clear my head is. This does put that gentle fog over your head...”"

“Pennywise is awesome at reliving pain and inflammation. With two hits from my pen and 10 minutes, i start feeling the relief. It can cause a little headache but only if you do too much at one time. 
The taste is a little like what I think liquid soap would taste like. A little harsh on the back of the throat if the hit is too big.  Pennywise is my first high cbd indica and I really like it for the pain relief. I don'...”
“My nickname for this strain is half&half" referring to the typical THC/CBD ratio. My first taste of Pennywise was 14% thc and 10% cbd. It was the most balanced high I'd ever felt.

column2: a flirty jar of Pennywise caught my eye.  The ratio is about 6% thc and 8% cbd. It is just as wonderfully balanced as my first exposure. The cbd helps a lot for chronic pain
column3: and adds a relaxed feel to the high.  Lower thc is also...”"

“I found the second time very similar to the first time. I found myself relaxed and with less pain, but wanting the effects to be a bit more THC. I was almost going to reduce my review to 3.5 stars.  Why didn't I? Today I blended about 30% Island Sweet Skunk into the Pennywise, loaded a pipe and vaped it. The skunk offered a bit of flavour and softened the vapor.  Just what I wanted, a bit of head effects.  The strain...”

“I officially love this strain. This is the the first weed I’ve smoked in decades and the experience was magical. An instant euphoria hit me in minutes followed by this amazing calming effect. My whole body felt like a giant stone after only a few hits. I quickly grabbed me some VEGAN ass nachos and water and descended into my couch. I was couch locked for hours, giggling calmly and happily to myself. Also, immediatel...”
“I get the worst menstrual cramps at night. 1-2 hits of pennywise helps me relax with a great night sleep. Wicked dry mouth tho.”

“This is a wonderful strain and depending on where you get it from, is a beautiful flower... the source that I received my Pennywise from I consider a lower quality source (you get what you pay for) The taste of this flower is woody and deep with hints of pepper... slightly harsh on the soft palate (mine was dry) coughing(coughy):5/10....This flower gives an almost instantaneous indica slump" feeling.. Great for just...”"
“Great for pain and chilling. Very active with it and helps me sleep at the end of the high.”

“Alright. I went to the dispensary because i got a lot of pain in my back and stomach problems. Got some critical mass 20.8%thc and some pennywise 8.9%THC - 8.3%CBD. Cured all my problems and stimulated my appetite, on a side note, indica strain but the buds are much more sativa-like in stucture. Strong odor thats just bareley lemony. 10/10 would smash agen”

“I got this strain to see what it'd do for my back pain and how my body feels in general (blah!) and I am pretty impressed with the way my body feels right now. I am also liking the nice little high that came with it. It's comfy.”

“I really like Pennywise, it’s a great Indica CBD strain for sleep and pain. For me, Indica CBD’s work best to help me sleep and to help with pain,tension etc. while Sativa hybrids help with anxiety and pain during the day when I don’t want to feel high and I need to be productive.
I vape this flower by itself, but I really like to mix it with Manito Kush or Shiatsu flower. 
By itself it gives a nice, soothing and mel...”

“Pain Reducing Mood Iron and Lift

Alert, Silly, but Tired. Functional, but smooth. Like a warm, babbling brook through an ice cold valley.
Floating like a single happy little cloud, in a wide blue sky. 

Words: Chill turtle. Wide lense. Earhole stretch.

Scent: Spicy Woody Pine.

No  👁/👅”
“A nice cbd strain with pleasant effects. It relaxes me but I also feel I can be productive on it. Has a honey note to the flavor profile. My only complaint is that the effects are not long lasting.”

“As a Crohn's Disease patient, I've experienced more than my share of pain and discomfort in my 20 year diagnosis. I'm a newly prescribed cannabis user and this particular strain changes my life on a daily basis. I was told 1:1 ratio is essential for Crohn's relief and this is dead on truth. 

With Pennywise I experience less pain, less digestive symptoms, more clarity than other strains. This is the only one that mak...”

“I smoked a fair amount of this strain last night.... and man is it ever an amazing surprising high.. very smooth going in and then its just instant relaxed state.. gives you a feeling a very chill happy and later a pretty sleepy vibe.. like you definitely want to smoke this while winding down at night. I can also recommend just smoking a little of this for a nice quiet movie night or netflix session with your loved o...”
“Pennywise tastes great, earthy, but clean and has a casual high but great pain killing ability! I will try to always have some on hand for pain!”

“I got this a week ago and it was so good that it took me three days to report back because well, I kept getting distracted. Really a good one to have with friends or roast solo and cue up some YouTube; you’re gonna wanna do that first or you may forget. 🦑”

“Have never been able to smoke marijuana because it induces anxiety and racing heart beat, even skipped beats.  This strain is wonderful.  It is a little heavier subdued feeling than just using CBD.  No racing heart or anxiety yet!  I take about 2-3 hits off a bowl and feel wonderfully relaxed for several hours.”

“Thought I was going to be a little disappointed with this strain to be honest. Great relaxing effects I no joke slept better than I have in a month last night, I'm saving the other nug I have for tonight!”

“I hesitated on the 4 star review. It could have been 3, 4 or 5. The pain relief was instant, easing my muscle pain and giving me overall more mobility in a positive way (I have EDS type III hypermobility, but can't walk correctly most days). The problem was that my heart rate spiked from 65 to 120 and my BP dropped from 105/72 to 94/60 within a few minutes. That eased over time, but I have IST and my heart doesn't ne...”

“Pennywise is an amazing strain to help with inducing munchies, relieving body aches, headaches, and over all the sense of feeling ill. Nice, and relaxing body high, with a clarifying mind high. I would really recommend Pennywise if you have the flu, food poisoning, a cold or just anything causing you to feel blue.”

“Alright. I went to the dispensary because i got a lot of pain in my back and stomach problems. Got some critical mass 20.8%thc and some pennywise 8.9%THC - 8.3%CBD. Cured all my problems and stimulated my appetite, on a side note, indica strain but the buds are much more sativa-like in stucture. Strong odor thats just bareley lemony. 10/10 would smash agen”
“A nice cbd strain with pleasant effects. It relaxes me but I also feel I can be productive on it. Has a honey note to the flavor profile. My only complaint is that the effects are not long lasting.”

The problem was that my heart rate spiked from 65 to 120 and my BP dropped from 105/72 to 94/60 within a few minutes. That eased over time, but I have IST and my heart doesn't ne...”

“Pennywise is an amazing strain to help with inducing munchies, relieving body aches, headaches, and over all the sense of feeling ill. Nice, and relaxing body high, with a clarifying mind high. I would really recommend Pennywise if you have the flu, food poisoning, a cold or just anything causing you to feel blue.”
“Not my favorite. I did not notice an improvement in pain and felt hungover the next day.”

“I have epilepsy that pills can’t help. I’m always very sore from the constant seizures and my depression has worsened, but this strain works wonders! I have smoked it medicinally (and recreationally, duh!) after my seizures. It takes my pain away almost instantly and it puts me in an absolutely wonderful mood! I definitely recommend it!”
“Very relaxing. Helps with pain so you can sleep at night. Not harsh. This is a slow one, creeps in slowly.”

“Awesome strain for actually just hanging out around the house possibly a smoke sesh with friends because you are still able to function after 4 bowls or more. I have also found excellent pain relief, more so than any other strains I have tried yet. It has a lower THC percentage compared to a lot of top shelf flower but with a 1:1 ratio of CBD you may not be super baked but you’ll feel great which is really what I’m l...”

“Short tight plants that are absolutely beautiful with even and super dense undergrowth. Seed pack had 4 out of 5 female seeds. The Penny Wise flowers are an absolute for any fan of the CBD and medical strains. A couple of the phenotypes  have purple-lavender accents at bloom while the others have a magnificent and vibrant lime. Smells are wonderful. Awesome strain. This is one to keep around the garden or in the seed...”

“Pennywise delivers all the typical Indica effects in a mild and subdued form. Great for pain, insomnia, and inflammation. This is another one of those wonderful strains that makes you feel like your whole body has been brought into alignment. It did spike my tinnitus a little bit but nothing that was long-lasting. More people are discovering the benefits of the strain and it is becoming expensive!”

“If you're looking for pain relief this is a great start, it's been around long enough to be priced fairly (I won't buy if it's over $10/g). Doesn't cloud my head, but mellows me out enough to relax while still being productive.

I'm on my feet almost constantly, this strain takes the back and foot pain down to manageable levels.”
“Great sex strain 😌”
“Very relaxing. Helps with pain so you can sleep at night. Not harsh. This is a slow one, creeps in slowly.”

“Procured this in pre-roll at Theory Wellness Dispensary in Bridgewater, MA.  I purchased this strain to try a lower thc percentage. Holy Toledo!  I feel tingly, soft and fuzzy sensations through my eyes and forehead. A moderately heavy body feel. I am noticing a little dry mouth and eyes. This strain doesn't make me feel lazy.  This strain seems to be effective in managing pain, as well. My back and shoulder feel mor...”
“I like it very good relaxing seelp”

“First and one strain I have had with such a high CBD count! the medical use is amazing. helps with headaches, pain, stress, anxiety, lack of appetite, the list can keep going for awhile. Great strain to try if you suffer from anxiety on a normal bases and other strains don't your anxiety. Try Pennywise out and see what a high CBD plant is like!”
“Very Chill and grounding. Not too high. Just right.”

“Pennywise delivers all the typical Indica effects in a mild and subdued form. Great for pain, insomnia, and inflammation. This is another one of those wonderful strains that makes you feel like your whole body has been brought into alignment. It did spike my tinnitus a little bit but nothing that was long-lasting. More people are discovering the benefits of the strain and it is becoming expensive!”
“Very Chill and grounding. Not too high. Just right.”
“Very relaxing. Helps with pain so you can sleep at night. Not harsh. This is a slow one, creeps in slowly.”

“Pennywise has helped ease so many of my migraines it is considered family❤ a no joke pain relief strain that has also helped with agonizing tooth pain. The taste at first considered boring. Something in between hay and lavender has turned into instant nostalgia of the intense comfort brought on when first using this flower. There is little to no stoned or high feeling, but level of pain relieving relaxation is strong...”

“Short tight plants that are absolutely beautiful with even and super dense undergrowth. Seed pack had 4 out of 5 female seeds. The Penny Wise flowers are an absolute for any fan of the CBD and medical strains. A couple of the phenotypes  have purple-lavender accents at bloom while the others have a magnificent and vibrant lime. Smells are wonderful. Awesome strain. This is one to keep around the garden or in the seed...”

“Finally was able to get my hands on a cartridge it was by optimum extracts 29.01%cbd & 53.03%thc. This strain hits fully in the body starting in my core and slowly working outward to my limbs. Feels closer to opium than cannabis 💨💣😉😙”

“I was looking for a strong sativa for social situations and instead ended up with this off a recommendation from a dispensary employee.. I had my doubts but PERFECT high for social interaction. I feel awake, talkative, and have an overall great feeling of well being. None of the expected couch-lock. Awesome stuff! New favorite!”
“Not my favorite. I did not notice an improvement in pain and felt hungover the next day.”
“Very relaxing. Helps with pain so you can sleep at night. Not harsh. This is a slow one, creeps in slowly.”

This is one to keep around the garden or in the seed...”
“Not my favorite. I did not notice an improvement in pain and felt hungover the next day.”
“really good cbd strain”

“I was looking for a strong sativa for social situations and instead ended up with this off a recommendation from a dispensary employee.. I had my doubts but PERFECT high for social interaction. I feel awake, talkative, and have an overall great feeling of well being. None of the expected couch-lock. Awesome stuff! New favorite!”
“lmao.. had a nice j of this and took a walk around in Portland, I felt like I was the mayor of the city..”
“So far this is one of my favorite CBD varieties. It has a nice balance to it.”

“This was my first high CBD strain. It definitely was effective at taking away aches and pains. However, for me, I still got a heavy body stone both times I smoked this. It felt just as strong as the THC leaning strains. I thought it would give me the pain relief while still being able to function but my ass was proper stoned. Overall, pleasant but not what I was looking for.”
“Very relaxing. Helps with pain so you can sleep at night. Not harsh. This is a slow one, creeps in slowly.”
“Not my favorite. I did not notice an improvement in pain and felt hungover the next day.”

I feel awake, talkative, and have an overall great feeling of well being. None of the expected couch-lock. Awesome stuff! New favorite!”

“Finally was able to get my hands on a cartridge it was by optimum extracts 29.01%cbd & 53.03%thc. This strain hits fully in the body starting in my core and slowly working outward to my limbs. Feels closer to opium than cannabis 💨💣😉😙”
“This strain hits hard, I mean I didn't rip my pipe it just ripped me.”

“It's taken me about a year to finally find this amazing flower. I cannot take high THC products this is the best of both worlds easy to use during the day and still get a good amount of pain relief thank you so much. Currently available at theory in Bridgewater Massachusetts.”

“It's taken me about a year to finally find this amazing flower. I cannot take high THC products this is the best of both worlds easy to use during the day and still get a good amount of pain relief thank you so much. Currently available at theory in Bridgewater Massachusetts.”

“I tried this strain last night and I really enjoyed it.  The anxiety I was already feeling soon floated away, my body relaxed, and I fell asleep easily. If you like higher CDB strains I would recommend trying this one out.”
“Not my favorite. I did not notice an improvement in pain and felt hungover the next day.”

“Pennywise is a nice high CBD strain with roughly a 1:1 ratio of CBD : THC. I believe it does lean toward indica, so it is more of a lazy day / late evening medicine than it is a morning pick-me-upper. 

While it doesn't knock you out in the way that most non high CBD indicas do, I still don't partake of Pennywise in the mornings, as it does relax me a bit too much for my own good on days that I would prefer to be pro...”
“Relieves anxiety. Mellow relaxing social high. It did however knock me out. I slept like a princess.”

“Pennywise came to me as a silver dollar sized bright green bud with a mild aroma and flavor. Vaped pretty smoothly.  This was my first time with a high CBD strain.  The high came on relatively slowly and was very enjoyable as it reached it peak.  I either felt the most sober I've ever felt while stoned, or the most stoned I've ever felt while sober.  Either way, there was no chance of anxiety with this.  It softens a...”

“This was my first high CBD strain. It definitely was effective at taking away aches and pains. However, for me, I still got a heavy body stone both times I smoked this. It felt just as strong as the THC leaning strains. I thought it would give me the pain relief while still being able to function but my ass was proper stoned. Overall, pleasant but not what I was looking for.”

“Finally was able to get my hands on a cartridge it was by optimum extracts 29.01%cbd & 53.03%thc. This strain hits fully in the body starting in my core and slowly working outward to my limbs. Feels closer to opium than cannabis 💨💣😉😙”

“Finally was able to get my hands on a cartridge it was by optimum extracts 29.01%cbd & 53.03%thc. This strain hits fully in the body starting in my core and slowly working outward to my limbs. Feels closer to opium than cannabis 💨💣😉😙”

“I was looking for a strong sativa for social situations and instead ended up with this off a recommendation from a dispensary employee.. I had my doubts but PERFECT high for social interaction. I feel awake, talkative, and have an overall great feeling of well being. None of the expected couch-lock. Awesome stuff! New favorite!”

“Smells like an IPA beer. Taste was not harsh at all, almost tobacco like. Worked well with my anxiety and did a little bit for my low back pain. One of the first times smoking that i felt like talking. Lasted about 3 hours 90% of the high was very clear headed and enjoyable. Light headache follows and dry eyes can be significant and uncomfortable.
*They hide things in the music*”
“Good strain, helps wind down the night. Great flavor, smooth pull. Would recommend if you need assistance relaxing.”
“Great flower super relaxing perfect for the virgin smokers...plus u get the healing properties of the cbd as a bonus!”
“GREAT STRAIN for all the things indicas are known for... And with that added lil' bit of thc  just for shits and giggles”
“Great strain to knock out inflamation, pain and superb for depression. Horrible munchies real turn off.”

“Just got this one today and I have really enjoyed it. It ramps up rather quickly (about 15 minutes) but it also drops off pretty quick. Which is great if you have things to do and don't want to be high for a long time. I would also recommend this for a beginner. My wife and I just start smoking cannabis and I tolerate this one very well. It's a well focused relaxing high that allows you to think and be more creative....”
“GREAT STRAIN for all the things indicas are known for... And with that added lil' bit of thc  just for shits and giggles”
“Great strain to knock out inflamation, pain and superb for depression. Horrible munchies real turn off.”

“Just got this one today and I have really enjoyed it. It ramps up rather quickly (about 15 minutes) but it also drops off pretty quick. Which is great if you have things to do and don't want to be high for a long time. I would also recommend this for a beginner. My wife and I just start smoking cannabis and I tolerate this one very well. It's a well focused relaxing high that allows you to think and be more creative....”
“very relaxing, slight dry mouth and unpleasant smell though.”

“I don't smoke much and when I do I start very slow. I have anxiety so I prefer high CBD and lower THC. Pennywise has a relaxing effect and more of a body high than a head high. But I definitely notice the headache and dry mouth.”
“Nice strong fruity and nutty tatse,the buzz comes on kind of mellow then stays mellow”
“Love it! Happy, relaxed tingly. Great value too at SWC. I highly recommend.”
“favorite cbd so far”
“Did a great job for what's it is. I did really miss the euphoria" since I enjoy that part. But after a few.... lights out! Slept great!”"
“relaxing ,back pain is non-existent while on Pennywise”
“I love this strain.  Light, breezy, just perfect.  I got a light buzz that was perfect for a wake and bake
column4:
and felt great going into my day.  
I don't think budtenders do their customers justice by always pushing the high THC flower.  High CBD may be the answer for some people.”

column3:
“Great strain. Relieves my pain, and keeps my head clear. 

Did make me a little sleepy, but, it is Indica after all.

The near 1:1 ratio on THC and CBD is what drew me in.

Definitely one of my favorite strains.”
“Easy to smoke, great for body and not hard the on the brain buzz. Definitely helped relax.”

“I just got home from the Blazers game, looking for something to calm me down but not let me forget those sick Damian Lillard crossover moves, the CJ McCullom drives to the hole, the big blocks from our front court youngsters Aminu and Plumlee. And I can honestly say that after a coupla bowl to my dome I'm feeling clear and my muscles are relaxing wonderfully. A real slam dunk.”

“A balanced feel that is quite good for pain, being relaxing without over tiring, and a mild euphoria.  I like this better than most CBD heavy strains, and I feel like the pain reduction is more noticeable.”
“Very nice one of the better tasting CBD’s very good at getting rid of pain quickly”

“one of my favorite CBD strains. I am very proud CBD it's my main source of usage when im dosing with my medical marijuana. It's a pleasure if an indica/CBD it'll calm you down and ease your pain. Great strain to spend the day in chill mode or if you have to get out of the house it'll still be a great provider of relief you need. The come on is subtle which in the case of this strain is great. I would very much recomm...”
“Funny enough, this feels really similar to Super Lemon Haze, easy smoke and uplifting effects. Nothing extra remarkable to say. It's a reliable high.”

“Nice, chill strain and not overpowering. I get that mild little head buzz the first 30 minutes before the CBD takes over and relaxed me. It's tough to really notice anything if I'm keeping my mind busy with video games, watching TV or doing any kind of active house work. But once I sit and relax, I want to just stay there and feel the comfort it gives me. After about an hour the dominant indica side begins to make me...”

“Exceptional strain! The most unique strain I've ever tasted! True to it's name, Pennywise has an earthy almost coppery taste to it without actually tasting metallic. Very mellow and clear headed high, my headache is gone completely and my nervousness has lessened.

However, this strain is not suggested for those seeking something that gets you high like something with high amounts of THC would. It does have a high CB...”
“Great strain for silliness and sleepiness. Thanks to Brett the budtender and everyone at Cannabis Nation in Seaside, Oregon! 🤗”
“Love this strain. Delicious. Healing. You cant go wrong. I would smoke this during migraines.”

“Smoked this last night and wow what a strain. The actual taste was really mild but the smoke actually made me cough, which is pretty rare. The high was fun and mild, I had a great time just watching YouTube, but after 45 minutes it KNOCKED ME OUT. I have never slept that deeply. I woke up and felt like I had the best night sleep in ages, even though I slept several hours less than usual. An amazing sleep aid with a f...”
“Not really a daytime thing. It made me really dizzy too. This is a nighttime, in bed, watching a weird movie, kind of thing.”
“Purchased at The Bake Shop in Washington”

“Not a strain I was excited to try... But became a favourite.   Clear headed and therapeutic... Light thc effects from aurora dispensary but didn't stop it from becoming my go to.   Had me moving slowly.”
“I smoked this last night! Instant knock out of the migraine. Only needed a few big puffs. Nice and calming effects. Great for sleep. Good taste and smell! On my favorite list”
“great for pain and no heavy cerebral so note: may be good for family members”
“Nice buzz. Nice flavor. Very relaxing.”
“Definitely made me laugh. Really good at taking your mind off things.”
“Very relaxing buzz for me with this one. Completely took all pai and cares away”

“Absolutely love! this CBD dominant strain. 

Upon consumption, I immediately notice a blanket of  body relaxation, with no to little psycho-activity.

Great for pain, and those who would love to have mental clarity. Mix this with some of your favorite strains for a synergistic, all-around effect.”
“Very nice one of the better tasting CBD’s very good at getting rid of pain quickly”

“Just got this one today and I have really enjoyed it. It ramps up rather quickly (about 15 minutes) but it also drops off pretty quick. Which is great if you have things to do and don't want to be high for a long time. I would also recommend this for a beginner. My wife and I just start smoking cannabis and I tolerate this one very well. It's a well focused relaxing high that allows you to think and be more creative....”
“Great flower super relaxing perfect for the virgin smokers...plus u get the healing properties of the cbd as a bonus!”
“Great at night, leaves me relaxed and clear headed. Definitely one of my favourites”
“definitely a great pain reliever, I have constant back pain and a nice bowl of pennywise takes the edge off and let's you relax.”
“When I smoke Pennywise I feel I’m in a hammock on the beach sipping on a piña colada while the breeze hits my face at sunset.”
“This strain is a good mix of CBD and THC.  It's very good for pain relief and gives a nice buzz to go with it.  It works well by itself or mixed with another strain with high CBD or THC.”

“wow , liked the bud smoked micro dosing. using for depressed mood, this improved my mood for a few hours in small doses. so I made an alcohol based tincture with some of it.
 double wow, the tincture improves my mood for 8 hours +. Better then any antidepressants out there. no similar bad side effects to rx, except a buzz.”
“I chose this strain as my evening tonic for aches and pains to help me get to sleep and rest comfortably. It was a good choice.”
“Nice color, solid meditation”

“I have usually tended toward THC high hybrids, but I heard that CBD is better for pain relief, so I decided to try it. That and it was one of the lowest priced strains at my local dispensary. I love it! The highs I’ve been having lately have been leading to deep, unsettling thought patterns. With Pennywise, I feel lighter, significantly less pain, and well functioning. This has to be my favorite strain so far. It’s t...”

“Wow. Wowwwww. Wow. This strain is so wild! Head buzz, body buzz, giggly, thoughtful. Loved music and deep thinking. Total pain relief bliss. Slept so good and airy. I feel so spacey and light. My cheek bones have taken flight.”
“This has got to be my favorite strain. I love other stains, and have tried many different ones through the years, but this one has become my go to!”
“Nice buzz. Nice flavor. Very relaxing.”
“Not really a daytime thing. It made me really dizzy too. This is a nighttime, in bed, watching a weird movie, kind of thing.”

The high was fun and mild, I had a great time just watching YouTube, but after 45 minutes it KNOCKED ME OUT. I have never slept that deeply. I woke up and felt like I had the best night sleep in ages, even though I slept several hours less than usual. An amazing sleep aid with a f...”

It's tough to really notice anything if I'm keeping my mind busy with video games, watching TV or doing any kind of active house work. But once I sit and relax, I want to just stay there and feel the comfort it gives me. After about an hour the dominant indica side begins to make me...”

“A balanced feel that is quite good for pain, being relaxing without over tiring, and a mild euphoria.  I like this better than most CBD heavy strains, and I feel like the pain reduction is more noticeable.”

column4:
and felt great going into my day.

column3: “GREAT STRAIN for all the things indicas are known for... And with that added lil' bit of thc  just for shits and giggles”
“Good strain, helps wind down the night. Great flavor, smooth pull. Would recommend if you need assistance relaxing.”
“Amazing! Light and earthy. Highly recommend. 🌲”
“is this strain hard to find?”
“NO DIZZY EFFECT. PAIN GONE! little goes along way, earthy sweet smell, very potent more CBD than THC and good tasting. and long lasting.  A+ from me .”

“It helps me with anxiety and keeps me active without the high-headed feeling. Good for the day, the effects is not as strong as the Lemon OG but it is not as light as Gelato. When it starts to fade I feel sleepy but not as strong as the LOG. An no paranoid feelings in public spaces.”
“It's nice but it gave me a headache”
“My favorite strain so far. A nice happy mellow uplift. The flavor isn’t remarkable so much as the quality of the effect. I use it to calm down and draw in the evenings without being drowsy.”

“In terms of pennywise RSO, this is hands down my favorite strain! I find this to be one of the most therapeutic strains with the level of CBD content it has. Its definitely more of a body high since it’s an indica. it helps tremendously with my pain and anxiety! I will continue to buy this strain over and over again in RSO. Shelby’s (Illinois) does such a great job always keeping the medical patients at best interest...”

“What an amazing strain!  Great for after work when you want to unwind. It really helps with getting to sleep when your brain won’t stop thinking.  The flavor tastes wonderful in my Firefly 2 flower vaporizer.  I have chronic pain from nerve damage and this helps. 
Perfect all around mellow strain.  Mine was close to the 1:1 ratio with the CBD 10%\THC 7%.”

“Got it to try based on the name alone - turned out to be the perfect strain for me. First off, this is the BEST smelling/tasting weed I've EVER had! Didn't give me any of the usual anxiety/paranoia, just watched a ton of shitty movies, ate my weight in munchies, then rolled over and went to sleep. I've bought it several times since I first tried it, plan on making a batch of creepy clown" cookies/brownies with it on...”"

“I was an expert smoker for many years, tjen after a traumatic experience I commonly got panicky and paranoid when smoking. My husband does not use often/at all. Maybe once a year. This strain was just perfect for us. My husband had an edible (5mg THC/0mg CBD) the day before and felt slightly anxious, he preferred this strain much more than the edible. Clarity and a soft high meet here! It doubles as a beautiful intim...”

“I was asked a guy at a local dispensary for something high in CBD that would make me feel good but not much of a head high, testing at 5% THC 11% CBD this definitely is the ideal candidate I was looking for, smoked 2 bowls couple hours before work and felt very very relaxed a little sleepy but that went away as soon as I got up and walked around definitely a mellow high and a overall good body high, really excited to...”
“Nice painkiller, low THC does not get you very high. Pretty nice peppery taste. For me, a perfect strain to mix with a higher THC one to get me where I need/want to go.”

“Another one of  your favorite CBD strains. I like it I'm a very active advocate of CBD this was one of the first CBD strains I got from a dispensary. It'll calm what ever hurts you. Totally grab it if you see it at a dispensary. Not to much cerebral very much body. Nice for walking around and enjoying shit. Totally worth it.”

“This strain ( or maybe just the batch I got ?) smells very strong, even vaped or just the buds themselves in my jar. The taste was not unpleasant, very earthy, like grass. I have trigeminal neuralgia and this strain really helps with pain. I found the effects to be a bit slow to take effect but they lasted a while. I was clear headed but a bit slowed down. Very relaxing and great for pain.  It gave me a serious case ...”
“Penny wise was a twizted DEMON who said, we all float down here." Hey you stupid kid
column4: you obviously aren't really going to float in a gutter
column5: especially if you just watched your idiot paper sailboat cruise down some car wash sludge runoff water of terror into the mouth of a FANGED  CLOWN. pennywise  is also the name of some super bro  tough guy pop pump band from the 90s. They were on like every 5 dollar cd compilat...”"

column3: “Definitely made me laugh. Really good at taking your mind off things.”
“I smoked this last night! Instant knock out of the migraine. Only needed a few big puffs. Nice and calming effects. Great for sleep. Good taste and smell! On my favorite list”
“great for pain and no heavy cerebral so note: may be good for family members”

“Not a strain I was excited to try... But became a favourite.   Clear headed and therapeutic... Light thc effects from aurora dispensary but didn't stop it from becoming my go to.   Had me moving slowly.”
“Great strain for silliness and sleepiness. Thanks to Brett the budtender and everyone at Cannabis Nation in Seaside, Oregon! 🤗”

“Exceptional strain! The most unique strain I've ever tasted! True to it's name, Pennywise has an earthy almost coppery taste to it without actually tasting metallic. Very mellow and clear headed high, my headache is gone completely and my nervousness has lessened.

However, this strain is not suggested for those seeking something that gets you high like something with high amounts of THC would. It does have a high CB...”
“Funny enough, this feels really similar to Super Lemon Haze, easy smoke and uplifting effects. Nothing extra remarkable to say. It's a reliable high.”

“I just got home from the Blazers game, looking for something to calm me down but not let me forget those sick Damian Lillard crossover moves, the CJ McCullom drives to the hole, the big blocks from our front court youngsters Aminu and Plumlee. And I can honestly say that after a coupla bowl to my dome I'm feeling clear and my muscles are relaxing wonderfully. A real slam dunk.”

“Great strain. Relieves my pain, and keeps my head clear. 

Did make me a little sleepy, but, it is Indica after all.

The near 1:1 ratio on THC and CBD is what drew me in.

Definitely one of my favorite strains.”
“relaxing ,back pain is non-existent while on Pennywise”
“Did a great job for what's it is. I did really miss the euphoria" since I enjoy that part. But after a few.... lights out! Slept great!”"
“favorite cbd so far”
“Great strain to knock out inflamation, pain and superb for depression. Horrible munchies real turn off.”

“Just getting into medical cannabis, and I didn't know how strong it really was. This strain is amazing, and didn't creep up on me. Great pain reliever for it is high in CBD. Overall, recommend for a clean high.”
“This is by far the best medicine out there, mostly would say for pain !”

“Let me start by staying in a light weight with low tolerance. I came to denver because nothing were I live helps with my severe anxiety and social anxiety(social phobia) so this was what felt like a drastic last attempt for help. And way the pennywise I got was from L'eagle dispensary and is was told was a HIGH CBD strain testing at 9%CBD:5%THC supposedly, but for a low thc strain it kicked it hard then a bitch I was...”
“very relaxing, slight dry mouth and unpleasant smell though.”

“I don't smoke much and when I do I start very slow. I have anxiety so I prefer high CBD and lower THC. Pennywise has a relaxing effect and more of a body high than a head high. But I definitely notice the headache and dry mouth.”
“Nice strong fruity and nutty tatse,the buzz comes on kind of mellow then stays mellow”

“I got a sample of this strain from GanjaCon in Portland recently, unfortunately without a THC/CBD breakdown, so I'm not sure how balanced my initial try was. I've recently bought this as a concentrate and it stands up to this experience:

That said, this strain is really nice. The high helps with pain, and relaxes me, but I remain alert and able to function well. It pairs well with coffee, and has kind of a peppery n...”

“Pennywise, being a 1:1 ratio strain is pretty good considering I have a high tolerance to Marijuana.
Quite surprising that it actually produces a nice, even, mellow high, and it calms my nausea.
The buds are nice and tight. Small and round, light to dark green in colour. Nice trichromes on my sample.
The smoke is smooth at the beginning of a spliff (joint), but becomes thicker and more choaky towards the end of your ...”

“This is probably (quietly) my favorite weed. It's a perfect daytime smoke for me, though the people at the dispensary were surprised when they heard that—apparently a lot of people use it for sleep. It's subtle and calming, with a dash of relaxed happiness, and it's not overbearing in any way.”

“This strain is my favorite! I know if fixes all levels of pain, IBS symptoms, and anxiety. It fixes all the undiagnosed funk that's in my head too. It feels like I don't have a worry and everything is good after vaporizing this. Tastes mouthwateri gly-peppery due to the terpenes. High in  Caryophyllene, I guess.”
“I tried a pre roll joint Pennywise from SccS.i fealt relaxed,euphoric,and calm.it really relaxed my muscles.”
“Light and pleasant. My gf's first taste of weed - she handled it great!”

“Smells and tastes awesome.  Never underestimate low THC.  Mine had 6% THC and 9% CBD.  This stuff can definitely make your head spin. 

It did an ok job with aches and pains.  It did however give me headaches. Apparently that's common with Pennywise.”
“So both it's parent are sativa dominant but it's listed as indica dominant🤔. Great smoke though👍🏿”
“This is a great strain—soothing and calming without an incapacitating high (for me). I feel the indica in my eyes a little, but other than that it is a great daytime smoke for me”

“Suitable 1:1 strain - adequate for treating arthritis pain while remaining functional. Fluffy, frosty light-green popcorn nugs with a healthy coating of orange hairs. Nothing to write home about in terms of flavor.”

“Great strain with great balance of CBD and THC, with a great feeling of  euphoric relaxation it's great for taking care of pain and has helped tremendously with my anxiety. Highly recommended for evening use since the drowsiness kicks in as an indica normally does.”

“Just took a few hits half hour ago. This paticular flower is 7.27 THC,  7.45 CBD. Nice balance, Clear headed, relaxing. Not overbearing, nicely relaxing - which is great because I'm sore. Great flower - it is my favorite for now”
“meh. It didn't really do anything for my pain and it didn't make me sleepy at all.  It also tasted like I was smoking actual grass, not weed.”

“Such a great strain. Makes sense because I'm a fan of Harlequin. felt almost no anxiety on this strain. Super mellow but didn't make me sleepy. Perfect for a day time chill. Also didn't last super long, which IMO is a good thing for when you wanna smoke and you have work later. Will definitely purchase again!”
“This strain works really well for me. Like most CBD flower, the taste is not awesome, but it knocks down pain and nausea without couch-lock. If you see it, grab it while you can!”

“Absolutely love! this CBD dominant strain. 

Upon consumption, I immediately notice a blanket of  body relaxation, with no to little psycho-activity.

Great for pain, and those who would love to have mental clarity. Mix this with some of your favorite strains for a synergistic, all-around effect.”

“This is my favorite strain to date!  I am very prone to getting anxiety with certain stains and I don't experience any with this one. I use it at night right before I lay down to sleep.  I usually have insomnia, but this strain calms my brain and makes me feel relaxed and happy, and I have no trouble sleeping. Another thing I love about this strain is how horny it makes me.  Sex feels absolutely incredible when I'm h...”
“My favorite strain. Relaxing and easy on your mind. Perfect for sleeping and dreaming. Very soothing and mellow, makes you light and good spirited.”
“Excellent. My favorite so far for past 4 years”
“gives me a cool and light feeling...not heavy at all...”
“This is a really good strain to take before bed. Fast acting Euphoria and then poof. Your stress is gone, sleep tight.”
“Pennywise sneaks up on you! Really nice relaxing body high. Excellent relief from anxiety, but a little too sleepiness-inducing for me to use during the day.”
“Definitely a must try for the patients with a need for higher CBD content. 1:1 ratio makes it almost perfect all around. Definitely relaxing though out the body as it should work...”
“Great physical effect with clear head and good smile”
“Fantastic! Chill and relaxed without couch lock. Fair amount of munchies before a wonderful solid sleep. Great for anxiety and insomnia. One of my faves.”

“I was blessed to come across this strain. Lately I have been extremely depressed and just over all in a bad 
spot. One bowl of this has me feeling incredible. Very cerebral, tastes amazing and is in my top buds I've ever smoked. Don't pass this up”

“Conscious Sedation!  Pink lemonade scent, sweet tones on the tongue, pepper on the throat.  Very slow onset.  Light mellow mood and calm but focused mind.  Stay in control of your brain with this beauty! 
*Are you having a test but feel like getting baked instead of studying?  I can't stop you but I can recommend this strain ;)”

“What a beautiful strain. Definitely woodsy and peppery tasting, and provides pretty much instant pain relief and muscle relaxation without any mind fog. 
I stay really clearheaded with Pennywise (even focused and creative), but it basically stopped my menstrual cramps. Great for migraines too.”
“I slept like a baby last night.”

“This has helped my anxiety and makes me happily high. Effects similar to xanax. I've only used at night so it definitely makes me a little tired, but that's good for me. Doesn't completely knock you out like an indica. Little energy bump to get stuff done before I go to sleep. Love it. I really think this is the perfect strain for me. No panic attacks, no paranoia. Very calming and happy. Used in low doses via non-va...”

“I have suffered with severe anxiety disorder and depression for the last several years, so it wasn't unusual for me to be awake and restless at 4:00 am. I decided to get up and pack my DaVinci Ascent with about 0.4 grams of Pennywise and I could not be more satisfied. 

The onset was both clean and immediate. I felt relieved of stress, relaxed, and even focused. For other medical patients or even the casual smoker, t...”
“it will turn you into the world's sleepiest, relaxed, happy clown. nothing scary like the name assumes.”

“This is an amazing strain. It makes me happy every time i smoke it. Very mild but suprisingly satisfying. Harlequin is very helpful mentally. Calms the brain. I feel HQ dominates this cross with none of the sativa anxiety effect from Jack the ripper. All good qualities of both strains are paired very nicely. Not a very exciting strain to smoke but well worth it.”
“Relaxing , and cerebrally uplifting. smelled and tasted Exactly like a grape tootsie pop.”
“Ok,  don't underestimate this strain. Been smoking some of the heavier thc indicas and this hits as hard or some times harder then 20%. Made me zone.”
“this is an amazing strain”
“Balanced high. Both cerebral and body effect but not over the top. Very relaxing”
“Subtle, light relaxing high.”
“Got this as a preroll... really nice, uplifting high. Gets you going.”

“I think that Penny wise  is one of the best strains to relieve headaches and seizures.   I would not have known what to use, if it where not for the friendly and knowledgeable staff at The Downtown Dispensary.  They made my first time an experience to remember, and made me feel welcomed.  The staff there is there to help and make you feel comfortable and at ease.  I would not have even known to use the penny wise and...”
“Fantastic for the first time user. feel your anxiety and stress melt away!”
“love this strain. great for my pain.”
“Nice aroma and quite tasty. I vaporized it and got a nice relaxed feeling and was able to focus. The effects didn't last very long though.”
“Very mellow with clear head. It didn't help me with my severe stomach aches but it did for milder pain. Definitely good for chilling out when stressed.”
“mellow & mild, but sweet & wild.”
“nice flavor, with only a little harshness" to it.”"

“A great strain. My favourite so far and a daily go to. Not too heavy high at all. No burnout. Helped pain fantastically with still being able to function. A perfect mixer to put a little in a higher THC like Alien Dawg to get a wee more head buzz with pain relief.”
“Quick review, it was OK. Nothing going against TJs was a vendor bud. Just wasn't my thing. Made me feel agitated and down.”
“Not as good for pain as Critical Mass.”
“I like the balance of CBD and THC”
“I purchase this strain for CBD often, and when I do I get it from the place the had best strain of it Oregon Green Rush.”

“The one that I got had 15% THC and 15% CBD. Got me couchlocked for two hours but really helped with my headache and my anxiety ! 
I would just recommend that for those who are new with weed, to not take too much of this strain at first cuz it's relatively potent.”
“Very relaxing Indica.yet functional.clear headed not racy or anxious.great for my anxiety and depression.add/adhd.it was 4.5 thc 10.5 cbd 3 puffs and I was calm.i usually smoke under 1% thc strains”

“This device, and its contents, are absolutely fantastic. As a vape pen it works like a charm, with a good draw. The flavour and aroma are magnificent. The 1:1 ratio of THC and CBD are extremely effective, sure to please. I passed mine around at backyard parties, around a fire, instead of a joint. Easy peasy, no coughing among non-smokers, no wasted anything. Top quality vape device and contents. Perhaps the best way ...”

“I got this as a disposable pen from White Palm. Great product for the price. This product is an awesome body buzz met with a focused cerebral head high. The toko disposable pen is great for on the go, throughout the day medicating.”

“I'm smoking the Pennywise vape cartridge from Healthy Pharms, it is 15.6% THC and 29.6% CBD...the high is very chill and can be giggly or make you more interested in things, also slight munchies and sleep is quite good. The flavor I came up with in my head was a peppery Pine-Sol haha...but it's pretty damn good! I think everybody would enjoy this high, but probably more so the Indica lovers like myself! #twothumbsup”
“This weed gave me a good relaxing high! One of my favorites!”
“Excellent strain for CBD content. Ordered from mjseeds.ca . We live in California and it arrived ultra discreet, with the pack of seeds hidden inside a puzzle box!”
“good for relaxation but too much mage me nauseous.”

“This is an awesome strain. It has pretty dense smaller buds with nice volume after being ground, nice red hairs too. It has a sweet earthy smell to it, with a smooth earthy sweet smoke, leaving a sweet almost citrusy after taste. Good swift buzzing head high with a calm body high that follows. Great for any time of day.”
“Amazing for everything it says it helps with.”

“Another great Indica !
This strain is a heavy body stone which is totally relaxing but it also compiments that with a nice euphoric headspace as well. For me, this is perfect for night time meds.”
“this stran blows some 25% indicas out of the water wow so relaxed not stressed and no pain hits super heavy and tast very unique sweet chemical flavor and smell”

“this strain is wonderful, i will say, its on the trippy side for me. Much to my surprise it did have pain relief effects. Mild for a few hits, also showing some indica effects.Wild erb, good smoke. check n it out east mesa.”
“gets you super stoned super fast, and a good thc and body high”

“Got some if this as a vape pen. Nice effect, super relaxed. The high cbd amount countered the thc amount so there wasn't much of a high, just complete relaxation. i decided to lay down and fell asleep with minutes, got a great night's sleep too.”
“Amazing.  When I got it the caregiver informed me of it's  lower THC level so I wasn't expecting to get high.  After a few minutes it hit me but after the initial oh
column4: well hello there" I mellowed out and relaxed.  Very calming and well rounded buzz.”"

column3: “Grew this for the first time this season (Outdoor), and I was VERY happy with the results. Not a high yielder, but totally worth it. Earthy, spicy, and smooth. Great on pain.”

“I smoked a big joint of this and it was a mellow yet meaningful high.
This is a good cbd strain and I found  it to be a manageable high without pulling me down with paranoia or getting me way to high. 
Every penny counts but pennywise is even better stuff, I love it!
I can afford to get high on this again with no worries.”

“Since I don't. smoke to relieve physical symptoms, just mental, I found this strain to be on the weaker side.  It would be perfect if you need pain relief without the strong mental high. It is relaxing, but that's about it for me. This would be perfect medication for those who need it, just not for me.”
“Good strain for pain, social anxiety, and general anxiety. Very relaxing strain. Light taste. You can hardly smell this one. Gives me the munchies big time though.”

“Bland, with less pronounced flavor and effects than other CBD strains I've tried. This was my second chance purchase (different grower and dispensary) and I'm still not impressed. A recent gram of Critical Mass CBD was far superior, tasty with 24% CBD!”
“Nice relaxing strain, mild high”

“I love pennywise it's the perfect balance. This strain can be smoked morning day or night. I'm always n a real good mood relaxed and pain free when I smoke pennywise. At home on the go doesn't matter it's the best cbd strain I've ever smoked.”
“Five hours later still stoned.  My brw favorite.  Made cannabis infused tea and bam. Painfree for hours.  Nice body and head high. Will definitely buy again.”

“For a high CBD strain, Pennywise is pretty good. It will keep you mellow all day and it really calms anxiety. If you're a light or newbie smoker this strain will give you  a mild buzz and will leave you functional. A great strain to smoke for the medical benefits or for newbies getting into smoking the herb.”

“Absolutely my most favorite strain. Wonderful during the evening right after work & right before my shower. I can easily smoke bowls of this all night long & goof off with my family. I’m more interested in what everyone’s doing & more silly which my family seems to love. ZERO anxiety or paranoia which is A+ for me. I have complete control over my body and thoughts, while enjoying a subtle body high. It’s perfect for ...”

“Smaller bud, indicative of a aero/hydro grow.  Really sticky, lots of brownish/orange hairs.  Smells of lemon furniture polish (Pledge).  Nice draw.  Initial taste of pine/earth aftertaste berry/citrus.  I would recommend this for PTSD and other anxiety disorders.  Leaves you feeling content and  able to face the day.  Not the best for insomnia.  It is relaxing, but I find that it doesn't hold a candle to any kush.  ...”
“Everything it says it is. It was a little dry though”
“The quality of flower I had was lacking, harsh, and really airy, so not dense at all. I didn't notice anything special about this strain. I would try again if I had a higher quality source.”
“unvelievable feeling no reported side agfects of yet. gives u a huge hit. best consumed mixed with tobacco in a joint.”
“This is really great for a mild buzz and watching some game of thrones. A great body stone and mild cerebral effects. Great medicine.”

“+5 I love this strain.
50/50 works well.”
“wanna try”
“Favorite go to strain for pain.”

“This is the worst CBD strain I have ever tried. It got me high and now my night is ruined. .97% THC 20.03% CBD. I also had a strong reaction to Jack The Ripper which is one of the parents with that one. If I was sick and had cancer maybe but not good for me for back pain and anxiety.”
“I am not to pleased by this strain .It doesn't have a relaxing nor help with sleep I have been up for 2days no sleep so I'm not”

“This strain, though high in CBD, still produces more of a head high than I expected, which made Beijing Hot Pot night a bit more interesting than I intended for. Let's just say there were no leftovers. I felt really relaxed and thoughtful and worked well for my pain. I prefer the mama strain, though (Harlequin) to this one.”
“I am not to pleased by this strain .It doesn't have a relaxing nor help with sleep I have been up for 2days no sleep so I'm not”
“The strongest shit i've ever tasted. Man this shit puts me to heaven and hell.”

“this strain had a pretty impressive cbd percentage...got it at the Higher Path ...awhile back ...but it was a truly enjoyable smoke ...a very fun high 
which left you with no burn out ...not the strongest but never the less  
great for pain and a great night sleep...”

“Clear and mellow stone with a slow onset of a heavy body and an immediate sense of chillax. The analgesic and relaxing properties of the CBD rich Harlequin mother come through nicely and the invigorating pep you get from the JTR high makes this an amazing all day smoke for with real medicinal value.
Taste/Aroma: Phenotypes range from a fresh ground coffee/pepper to a lemon bubblegum. The smoke is harsh and irritates ...”

“I fell in love with this strain before I knew it was a cbd only strain. It has such a clean taste when smoked. No harshness, just totally yummy flavor. I love this strain for migraines, nausea, anxiety and insomnia. It knocks out what ails you and leaves you feeling uplifted and peaceful.”

“Pennywise does't hit as hard on the front end as Harlequin; but the pain management and the energized effects, though definitely present, don't seem to run as deep for the duration, as the Harlequin's does.

Definitely a day time treat for pain relief, when I don't have the time to get through 30-45 minutes of the front-end high.”
“i love this strain. not a super high or long lasting but relaxing and pain relief instantly.”
“meeehhhhh”
“Read this is great for detail oriented work”
